Package chess

Class ChessPiece

java.lang.Object
chess.ChessPiece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bishop, EmptyPiece, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public abstract class ChessPiece
extends java.lang.Object
This is the parent class of each chess piece class.
Version:
2.0
Author:
Seth Steinbrook and Getty Muthiani

    • getMoves

      public abstract java.util.ArrayList<Move> getMoves​(ChessPiece[][] board)
      Finds all the moves a piece can make.
      Parameters:
      board - ChessPiece 2d array
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Moves of all the moves a pice can make

    • getPieceColor

      public abstract int getPieceColor()
      Gets the color of the piece. 0 for white. 1 for black.
      Returns:
      int color of the piece

    • isAttackingKing

      public abstract boolean isAttackingKing()
      Gets if a piece is attacking the opponent's king.
      Returns:
      boolean true is a piece is attacking the opponent's king, false if not
